mapper.sql: id, questionnaire_id, language, translate_language, title, cue_word
mapper.select: SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(language) from t_questionnaire_desc where questionnaire_id=#{questionnaireId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY questionnaire_id order by questionnaire_id ;
mapper.insert: insert into t_questionnaire_desc (questionnaire_id, language, title, description, cue_word) values (#{questionnaireId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{cueWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) on duplicate key update questionnaire_id = values(questionnaire_id), language = values(language),translate_language=values(translateLanguage) title = values(title), description = values(description), cue_word = values(cue_word)

insert into t_questionnaire_desc
questionnaire_id,
language,
translate_language,
title,
cue_word,
description,

on duplicate key update questionnaire_id = values(questionnaire_id), language = values(language),translate_language = values(translate_language), title = values(title), description = values(description), cue_word = values(cue_word)
mapper.update:

questionnaire_id = #{questionnaireId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
language = #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
translate_language = #{translateLanguage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cue_word = #{cueWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and questionnaire_id = #{questionnaireId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
